hero.title: Coding Club for FLINTA* in Vienna

about.title: Meet G:URL*s
about.description: We're a coding club for the FLINTA* community, open to anyone interested in learning or improving their programming skills. Whether you're just starting out or already experienced, you'll find a supportive space to connect, ask questions, and grow at your own pace!

standFor.title: What We Stand For
standFor.subtitle: The name G:URL*s reflects what matters to us:

redefining.title: Redefining
redefining.description: Challenging norms and reshaping tech culture

solving.title: Solving
solving.description: Using code to make impact and tackle challenges together

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We host biweekly events in English that range from beginner-friendly workshops, practical coding sessions, and tech talks to social events and co-working evenings. Some events focus on learning new tools or building projects, while others are simply about connecting with others in tech.
whatWeDo.footer: You're welcome to join as often as you like, no need to prep or commit to anything long-term!

whoCanJoin.title: Who Can Join
whoCanJoin.description: If you identify as FLINTA* and have an interest in tech, you're welcome to join, no matter your background, experience, or education. You don't need to be an expert, just curious and open to learning. We're a space for beginners, career changers, hobbyists, and anyone who wants to explore tech in a supportive environment.
whoCanJoin.flintaExplanation: FLINTA* stands for Female, Lesbian, Intersex, Non-binary, Trans, Agender, and other non-binary gender identities.

upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.subtitle: Ready to code, connect, and collaborate? Check out our upcoming workshops, meetups, and community sessions:

contact.title: Contact Us | G:URL*s Coding Club
contact.description: Get in touch with G:URL*s Coding Club. Send us a message, ask questions, or share your ideas.
contact.heroSubtitle: Have a question, idea, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.sectionText: Whether you want to join our community, sponsor an event, volunteer, or just chat about code, we're here for you.
